dict.acceptation: 种族的，部落的；某文化群体的；

sent.orig: Ethnic eco-ethics attaches great importance to a balanced development of natural environment, socio-economy and ethnic cultures.
sent.trans: 民族生态伦理学强调自然环境、社会经济与民族文化的整体和谐发展。

sent.orig: The Yi ethnic group is an ethnic minority inhabiting the southwest of China.
sent.trans: 彝族是分布在我国西南方的一个少数民族。

sent.orig: Apart from the Han ethnic group, architecture in the ethnic minorities is also diversified and distinct.
sent.trans: 除了汉族的建筑，其它少数民族的建筑风格也十分别致、独特。

sent.orig: An ethnic nationalist definition of a nation exclusive: ethnic nations typically do not have open membership.
sent.trans: 一般在一个民族的部分成员住在邻国时会出现民族统一主义的呼吁。

sent.orig: China is a unitary multi-ethnic country jointly created by its people of all ethnic groups.
sent.trans: 中国是全国各族人民共同缔造的统一的多民族国家。
